name: Commando (itch) (SubZeroJoshy)
description:
This a action / adventure game that has 13 levels, and has animations for the players and enemy's.

The enemy's have a cone of vision, and if you're in their cone of vision, they will shoot.

You can shoot by pressing the space bar, and throw grenades by pressing the g button. 

W is to jump. S does nothing. A is to move left. D is to move right.

Have FUN playing this game!!! :)
